column4: hello, i love music, and scrobbling, would u reccommend rhtythmbox or songbird?
banshee
banshee? why?
cuz it's the best: http://banshee.fm/
give it a whirl
can banshee write metadata into the files?
like id3v2?
yes, write the cover in the file, so it will remain with the cover no matter what player u use
not sure, probably
it takes like 2 seconds to install just play with it lol
learn via discovery/exploration
ok
i just dont like to install too much apps just to try because i came from windows and windows get slow if u install and unisntall a lot of programs, will this happen to ubuntu too?
yea that's nonsense in linux land, don't be afraid to install something, it can be easily removed
here's the PPA for it, so you can have cutting edge builds: https://launchpad.net/~banshee-team/+archive/ppa
sorry but PPA?

the latest builds of banshee very slowly make their way into the official Ubuntu repository(ies). By adding launchpad into your third party sources, you give yourself access to the build team's updates, so you don't have to wait for Ubuntu to approve and add.
the process is outlined on the website
i only use ubuntu, i dont need grub2 amirite?
load a livecd into the virtual OS, then you can repartition or wipe the virtual disk at your leisure.
ty
